actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to stabilize the price of propane.

summary.text: Directs the President, under the Economic Stabilization Act, to issue an order: (1) stabilizing wholesale and retail prices of propane at January 1, 1973, levels; and (2) permitting adjustments in such prices to reflect cost charges related to propane production and distribution since January 1, 1973.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Economic Stabilization Act of 1970 to stabilize the price of propane.
